00030 #include "AbstractIvpOdeSolver.hpp"
00031 
00032 AbstractIvpOdeSolver::AbstractIvpOdeSolver()
00033     : mStoppingEventOccurred(false),
00034       mStoppingTime(DBL_MAX)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 AbstractIvpOdeSolver::~AbstractIvpOdeSolver()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 void AbstractIvpOdeSolver::SolveAndUpdateStateVariable(AbstractOdeSystem* pAbstractOdeSystem,
00043                                                        double startTime,
00044                                                        double endTime,
00045                                                        double timeStep)
00046 {
00047     if (   (pAbstractOdeSystem->rGetStateVariables().size()!=pAbstractOdeSystem->GetNumberOfStateVariables())
00048         || (pAbstractOdeSystem->rGetStateVariables().size()==0) )
00049     {
00050         EXCEPTION("SolveAndUpdateStateVariable() called but the state variable vector in the ODE system is not set up");
00051     }
00052     Solve(pAbstractOdeSystem, pAbstractOdeSystem->rGetStateVariables(), startTime, endTime, timeStep);
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool AbstractIvpOdeSolver::StoppingEventOccurred()
00056 {
00057     return mStoppingEventOccurred;
00058 }
00059 
00060 double AbstractIvpOdeSolver::GetStoppingTime()
00061 {
00062     return mStoppingTime;
00063 }
